The face staring back at him was his, or close enough to his, but the rest of his body had been completely transformed. "I said are you alright?"

"Uh, yeah, yeah," he stuttered, realizing that the pitch of his voice had changed. It was much higher than it should have been.

"Are you sure you're alright, you don't sound well."

"No, no, I'm fine," he said, deliberately trying to lower the tone of his voice, but still not sounding like himself.

"You had better take some medicine when you get done in there, you sound terrible. I think that trip to the lake made you sick." The humming resumed and the voice faded as his mother moved back down the hall.

Oh man, what was he going to do? His mother would not understand this. Hell, he didn't understand it. As he got back to his feet, he realized that he still hadn't adjusted to standing in his new body and he grabbed the countertop for support. Who knew being a girl could be so hard?

As he poked his head around the door frame, he could hear his mother moving about in the kitchen, and he made a break for it, moving as quickly as he could on his tiptoes. As soon as he was safely through the door, he closed and locked it behind him.

Whew!

Not bad, he thought, I might even date myself. That drew a bemused smile from his now more full and feminine lips. As he pondered what steps he would take next, he realized how thirsty he was. Normally, he would have downed a swallow of water from the disposable paper cups his mother kept by the sink in the bathroom, but he had obviously had more pressing matters to consider at the time. "Oh ... okay coming," he grunted, still not fully focused. Jesus, what was going on this morning. He still didn't feel right, but he felt better now, better than before when he was a ...... SHIT! He froze just as his hand touched the doorknob. A GIRL! He spun around toward the window, with fear rising in him. What should he do, should he try to escape, or should he just face his mother now? Well, he thought, what was the worst that could happen? He again turned toward the door, slowly opening it for his mother.

He expected her to faint dead-away, or at least shriek and run away, but she did neither. "Johny, honey, are you okay," she asked. "You sounded awfully strange in the bathroom and now you look like you just woke up."

"I...uh, well, I haven't been feeling to well this morning."

HIS VOICE! That was it, his voice was back. He looked down at himself. EVERYTHING ... everything was back. He was his old self again. What was going on he asked himself? Had he dreamed it all? No, that was impossible. His mother had said he was in the bathroom, and he knew that had been real. This was too weird. One minute he was a girl, he took a drink of water and passed out, next thing he knew, he was back to being a guy.

His mother's voice brought him out of his reflection. "I think you need to go back to bed and rest for a while," she insisted.

"Yeah," Johny muttered. "Yeah, I think you might be right." He crawled back in bed as his mother withdrew, closing the door behind her.

He lay on his back staring at the ceiling. Water - that had to be the key. At first he thought that it was the lake water that had caused his transformation, but the water on his nightstand was plain tap water. He pushed himself into a sitting position. Did just drinking water change him? If so, how come it had never happened before. He reluctantly took another sip of his water and waited. Nothing. No tingling, no warmth, no ... well, you know. Hmm, so it wasn't just water. He lay back down and tried to figure it out. What was different, what didn't fit? He was pretty sure that the water at the lake had done something to change his appearance, and possibly his genetic makeup, but the effects seemed to be temporary. But, why hadn't he changed yesterday, why overnight? He was fine all up until the time he fell asleep, then when he woke up, BAM, he's a girl. And he stays a girl until he gets thirsty and takes a drink ..... Could that be it? It had to be! As long as he had enough water in him and he was properly hydrated he remained a male, but if he didn't drink enough or became dehydrated, he would change into a girl.

Well then, he would just have to make it his business to make sure he always drank enough. But...then again, there COULD be certain advantages to being a girl at times, he thought mischeviously. info.description:
Johny was normal boy, he was about 16 years old. His life was normal, maybe little boring. Until one day. That day he was on vacation in China. He was camping in some recreational area. That afternoon, when he wanted to make lunch for self, he taked water from nearby spring. (Fans of Ranma maybe recognised that Johny misunderstooded recreational area with training area Jusenkyo. Yes, he is there...)
He used water from Nyannīchuan - After he ate that food, he started feeling weird. The curse started to affecting him. But because he wasn't fall into spring and/or maybe because he boiled that water before he got to contact with it, the curse got new form. At first, his changes will happen randomly, without contacting with water and same it is with changes back. Also he can change completelly or partially, so he can become boy with breasts or he can change into dickgirl. And his girl appearance can be always different. One times he can become short-haired brunette with B-cups and next time he will be long-haired blond with C-cups. But everytime he transform into nice girl, never to ugly.
Sex is allowed, pair him with male or female, it depends on you. But keep him with nice looking persons.
